question: Federation, Indian responsibility, reservation and safeguards were the three lynchpins of which of the following announcements?
explanation: Federation, Indian responsibility, reservation and safeguards were the three lynchpins of Gandhi-lrwin Pact. The \'Gandhi-Irwin Pact\' was a political agreement signed by Mahatma Gandhi and Lord Irwin, the then Viceroy of India, on 5 March 1931 before the second Round Table Conference in London.
